metadata.title: CVE-2024-42331 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In the src/libs/zbxembed/browser.c file, the es_browser_ctor methodretrieves a heap pointer from the Duktape JavaScript engine. This heappointer is subsequently utilized by the browser_push_error method in thesrc/libs/zbxembed/browser_error.c file. A use-after-free bug can occur atthis stage if the wd->browser heap pointer is freed by garbage collection.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
